A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A daring\, emotional and powerful blockbuster to be reckoned with! Episode VIII has everything that I can ask from a Star Wars movie and more. It's not quite perfect and some of its many twists will bitterly divide fans but I can't help but be captivated by its thoughtful storytelling\, imaginative world-building and jaw-dropping spectacle. Completely floored me!
